document.full_text: a man who kidnapped, robbed and killed an eastern alabama couple in 1986 is scheduled to be executed by lethal injection on thursday evening, the first inmate to be put to death under new governor robert bentley's watch.
document.title: alabama man due to be executed for 1986 double murder
lines_and_colors: a man who kidnapped, robbed and killed an eastern alabama couple in 1986 is scheduled to be executed by lethal injection on thursday evening, the first inmate to be put to death under new governor robert bentley's watch.
